New Records: Kiké Hernández tied Babe Ruth for the most postseason home runs
Key Match Events: Kiké Hernández hit a two-run home run in the 6th inning
Max Muncy hit a home run in the 9th inning
Others: The game was a 8-0 victory for the Los Angeles Dodgers over the New York Mets in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series
